module.name: Calendar
module.description: This module is used to manage calendar and time based events for FreePBX
module.changelog: *14.0.3.1* add console command *14.0.3* Centralize cron into job *14.0.2.19* Fix visual issue on calendar event group category filtering *14.0.2.18* Fix bug with viewing reoccuring dates *14.0.2.17* FREEPBX-18329 *14.0.2.16* FREEPBX-19608 *14.0.2.15* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *14.0.2.14* FREEPBX-19607 Exception Invalid URL While creating the ical Calendar with empty URL field *14.0.2.13* FREEPBX-19606 Java script Issue in Calendar Events. *14.0.2.12* Fix uninstaller *14.0.2.11* FREEPBX-17710 Fix issues with events with duplicated uids *14.0.2.10* FREEPBX-15736 use system default timezone *14.0.2.9* FREEPBX-18919 *14.0.2.8* FREEPBX-18903 *14.0.2.7* Bugfix/FREEPBX-17403 recurring events with no end date via ical google cause high load *14.0.2.6* FREEPBX-17770 Calendar Module "Whole Day" goes to state unmachted *14.0.2.5* FREEPBX-16507 *14.0.2.4* FREEPBX-15736 FREEPBX-17021 *14.0.2.3* FREEPBX-16890 support categories and calendars in group screen *14.0.2.2* Make sure command is uninstalled *14.0.2.1* Move code to install.php so we can be sure it was executed *14.0.2* FREEPBX-16747 FREEPBX-16507 update libraries *14.0.1.2* FREEPBX-14951 Fix whitespace in name, trim validation *14.0.1.1* FREEPBX-15188 Fix Event form to submit properly through AJAX *14.0.1* Stable release *14.0.1beta2* FREEPBX-15175 FREEPBX-14951 *14.0.1beta1* FREEPBX-15023, FREEPBX-15022, FREEPBX-15021, FREEPBX-15016, FREEPBX-14951, FREEPBX-14860 *14.0.1alpha10* FREEPBX-14946 FREEPBX-14955 FREEPBX-14956 FREEPBX-14921 *14.0.1alpha9* FREEPBX-14956 FREEPBX-14921 *14.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-14395 Calendar Month not displaying correctly in safari *14.0.1alpha7* FREEPBX-14327, FREEPBX-14329, FREEPBX-14338, FREEPBX-14335, FREEPBX-14336 *14.0.1alpha1* Development
